participant_1.background:
My goal is to be a great teacher and inspire my students to be the best they can be.
I am in good shape and my weight is healthy.
I do not care about the weather as long as I can play video games.
I'm a creative person who loves to make my own clothes and play board games.
I collect cat-themed items because they bring me joy and remind me of my favorite animal.

participant_2.background:
I've been to many exotic places, but my favorite is Japan
i like horseback riding.
my mom is a music teacher at the elementary school.
My parents are not tech-savvy, but they are very supportive of my interests.
I like to visit music websites to keep up with new releases and find new artists to listen to.

content.text: Hello! I'm a teacher and I love my job. I want to inspire my students to be the best they can be.
Hey there! My mom is also a teacher, and she loves her job too. She's a music teacher at the elementary school. What grade do you teach?
I teach kindergarten, so I'm just starting out with my teaching career. It's a lot of fun!
That's awesome! I'm sure you're a great teacher.
I'm sure you do! I'm not sure what I want to do when I grow up, but I'm interested in a lot of things.
That's great! It's important to explore your interests and find something you're passionate about.
Yeah, I agree. I've been to a lot of exotic places, but my favorite is Japan. I love the culture and the food.
Japan sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go there.
You should definitely go! It's a beautiful country.
